column4: Hey .. trying to make an iso of my sons dvd to put on my mediabox. Trying this: dd if=/dev/cdrom of=/home/milligan/BeeMovie.iso . I'm getting dd: reading `/dev/cdrom': Input/output error. Same with cdrom1 (which is a burner). The disk plays in the ps2 (and in the dvd-player that crapped out a week ago). What could be wrong ?
Have you made isos from dvds before?
It could be complicated, dvds are not just to read as you wish. check out www.doom9.org :)
